page.title: 16Bildeston Teacher's Day
page.content: around,Teddybear,Teddybear touch the ground; Teddybear,Teddybear climb up stairs, Teddybear,Teddybear say your prayers - Teddybear,Teddybear switch off the light; Teddybear,Teddybear say goodnight.' Some children were practic- ing racing for the annual Sports Day, and some were watching the river, which was abnormally high, as it had been the wettest June on record.One boy noticed a sparrows nest in the cover of the electric bell on the outside wall. At a staff meeting in the dinner hour, we discussed the introduction of a new dinner routine which would involve the use of trays containing dinner and dessert.The staff felt this was a lower ing of the children's social standards. The children chose their activities in the afternoon.Two mothers came to help.
